name: Dragon Lance
description: The forward charge of the wyvern host grants no quarter.

abilities.name: Dragon's Reach
abilities.description: Grants flat attack range bonus to ranged wielders.
notes: The bonus attack range from multiple Dragon Lance-based items do not stack.
Stacks additively with other ranged bonus attack range sources.

additionalInfo: The attack range bonus works for ranged heroes only.
Stacks with all other attack range bonuses.
Affects the cast range of active attack modifiers as well.
